question: [File: volo-vault/sources/requests/deposit_request.move] [Function: new()] [Gas Griefing] Constructor is cheap to call - could attacker spam request creation to exhaust operator gas budget executing invalid requests? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/requests/deposit_request.move] [Struct: DepositRequest] [Cancellation Exploit] Recipient check only in cancel - could attacker transfer receipt ownership after request, then cancel using old recipient to steal coins? (High)
